who_intro: “Resol” means reflected sunlight. We see ourselves as a reflection of many hands and hearts — local leaders, educators, clinicians, volunteers, donors, and neighbors near and far.
meaning: Resol is a Spanish word for sunlight reflected from a surface. The sun’s light is constant, generous, and shared by all. Those ideas shape our purpose.

values.title: Collective light
values.text: Our work is a reflection of shared love, skill, and hope — never just one person or one organization.

values.title: Sustainability
values.text: Like the steady sun, we build programs that last and grow with the community.

values.title: Equity
values.text: Health is for everyone, regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, or religion.

facts: Travel to clinics can range from an hour by foot to several hours by road.
Many community members attend ~3–4 years of school; many women attend 1–2 years.
Basic infrastructure like sewage systems and garbage disposal is limited in some areas.
Clean, potable water is not guaranteed for many households.
